predicate.note: Frames file for 'pump' based on sentences in financial subcorpus. Verbnet entry 9.7, other framed members include load, spread, stack, stock, unload, and probably store. Framenet classes FIlling and Placing. Comparison with 'load' and 'increase'

example.name: all args
example.text: Osamu Nagayama, deputy president of Chugai, which spends about 15% of its sales on research and development, was unable to pinpoint how much money Chugai would pump *trace* into Gen-Probe.

example.name: Hans und Franz
example.text: The SEC has alleged that Mr. Antar aimed *trace* to pump up the company's stock price through false financial statements in order to sell his stake and reap huge profits.
example.arg: in order to sell his stake and reap huge profits

example.name: poor John
example.text: John pumped out his basement apartment with a handpump.
